statements: SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT customer_id, rating FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY rating DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE agent_id = 123;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_feedback_count FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, suggestion_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE agent_id = 5 AND rating < 3;
SELECT feedback_id, agent_id, customer_id, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 10 ORDER BY rating ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE agent_id = 3 AND feedback_text LIKE '%improve%';
SELECT COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedbacks, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE agent_id = 7;
SELECT * FROM Agents;
SELECT name, email FROM Agents WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name, email FROM Agents ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, MAX(name) AS max_name FROM Agents GROUP BY id;
SELECT A.name, F.feedback_text FROM Agents A JOIN Feedback F ON A.id = F.agent_id;
SELECT * FROM Agents WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM Agents WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM Agents WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT Agents.name, Feedback.feedback_text FROM Agents JOIN Feedback ON Agents.id = Feedback.agent_id;
SELECT Agents.name, COUNT(feedback_id) AS feedback_count FROM Agents LEFT JOIN Feedback ON Agents.id = Feedback.agent_id GROUP BY Agents.name;
SELECT * FROM Agents;
SELECT agent_name, agent_email FROM Agents;
SELECT agent_name, agent_email FROM Agents ORDER BY agent_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Agents WHERE agent_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT agent_id, agent_name, agent_email FROM Agents;
SELECT agent_name, agent_email, agent_id FROM Agents ORDER BY agent_name DESC;
SELECT agent_id, agent_name, agent_email FROM Agents WHERE agent_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM ProductImprovements ORDER BY suggested_date ASC;
SELECT improvement_description, suggested_by FROM ProductImprovements WHERE suggested_by = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM Agents;
SELECT agent_name, agent_email FROM Agents WHERE agent_department = 'Sales';
SELECT agent_name, agent_email FROM Agents ORDER BY agent_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM Customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%123%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Agents WHERE agent_department = 'Sales';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%555%';
SELECT agent_name, agent_email, a.agent_department FROM Agents a JOIN Feedback f ON a.agent_id = f.agent_id WHERE f.customer_id = 1;
SELECT suggestion_text, suggestion_date FROM Suggestions WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY suggestion_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM Feedback WHERE agent_id = 3 AND feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Agents;
SELECT agent_id, agent_name, agent_email FROM Agents WHERE agent_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM Feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT suggestion_id, customer_id, suggestion_text FROM Suggestions WHERE suggestion_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT agent_name, agent_email FROM Agents;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT suggestion_text, customer_id, suggestion_date FROM Suggestions ORDER BY suggestion_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM Feedback WHERE feedback_id = 5;
SELECT agent_name, agent_email FROM Agents JOIN Customers ON Agents.agent_id = Customers.customer_id;
